data.eml:eml: Database contains specimen records from the Odonata collection of the Naturalis Biodiversity Center (Leiden, Netherlands). These specimens originate from the collections of the National Museum of Natural History (RMNH, Rijksmuseum voor Natuurlijke Historie), later National Museum of Natural History, Naturalis in Leiden and of the former Zoological Museum Amsterdam (ZMA). On request more information or pictures (if available) can be provided.
